author: Dailymail Reporter
title: Kim Kardashian appears to have gone blonde again on social | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share She also showcased her washboard abs as she paired the bra top with a coordinating high-waisted skirt which sat above her belly button. Kanye West's hot wife accessorized with a blinged out diamond choker around her neck. They go way back! Kim and Paris Hilton are longtime friends. The pals used to party together back in 2007 Golden girl: She later took to her Scnapchat to show off her lighter locks Spooky: She also played around with a few of the filters The behind-the-scenes selfie also revealed a full house behind her in the mirror who were filming her while she got glammed up. Kim captioned the top of the sexy selfie with: 'Happy Birthday Paris Hilton!' Kim also appeared to debut fresh tresses during her social media birthday tribute to her friend, whom she used to party with dating back to 2007. Wigged out: In February 2016, Kim unveiled long blonde locks - but she later revealed it was just a wig - as she attended Kanye's Yeezy Season 3 fashion show in New York City If Kim did in fact dye her raven tresses blonde, this certainly wouldn't be the first time. In February 2016, Kim unveiled long blonde locks - but she later revealed it was just a wig - as she attended Kanye's Yeezy Season 3 fashion show in New York City. She truly attempted the ambitious shade, going ultra platinum, bleaching her naturally brunette locks before stepping out during Paris Fashion Week in March 2015. The real deal: In March 2015, Kim shocked the world as she stepped out in Paris debuting a platinum blonde do Aww: Paris Hilton shared this throwback photo on Friday featuring Kris Jenner on her 21st birthday Share or comment on this article 492
